resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102969</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102969</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204434</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">It's all about them!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es ist ganz über sie!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Elle est tout au sujet d'elles !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É toda sobre elas!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È interamente circa loro!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι όλος για τους!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Está todo sobre ellas!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will create a class database in preparation for the North Carolina Test of Computer Skills using information about their classmates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erstellen eine Kategorie Datenbank in der 
Vorbereitung für den Nord-Carolina Test der Computer-Fähigkeiten mit
Informationen über ihre Mitschüler.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants créeront une base de données de classe en
vue de l'essai du nord de la Caroline des qualifications 
d'ordinateur en utilisant des informations sur leurs camarades de 
classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes criarão uma base de dados da classe na 
preparação para o teste de North.carolina de habilidades do 
computador usando a informação sobre seus classmates.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi creeranno una base di dati del codice 
categoria in preparazione per la prova del North.carolina delle 
abilità del calcolatore usando le informazioni sui loro classmates.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα δημιουργήσουν μια βάση δεδομένων 
κλάσης σε προετοιμασία για τη δοκιμή της βόρειας Καρολίνας των 
δεξιοτήτων υπολογιστών χρησιμοποιώντας τις πληροφορίες για τους 
συμμαθητές τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes crearán una base de datos de la clase en 
la preparación para la prueba de Carolina del Norte de las 
habilidades del ordenador usando la información sobre sus classmates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SKIP THIBAULT
FN:SKIP THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204434</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102969</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/its-all-about-them</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
